title: gsl is broken on macOS
body:
subj

### Expected Result

`gsl` builds
### Actual Result

```
==> Installing gsl
==> Fetching http://mirror.switch.ch/ftp/mirror/gnu/gsl/gsl-2.4.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek
==> No patches needed for gsl
==> Building gsl [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'

4 errors found in build log:
     335    /bin/sh ../libtool  --tag=CC   --mode=compile /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I..  -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-
            2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4   -g -O2 -MT file.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/file.Tpo -c -o file.lo file.c
     336    /bin/sh ../libtool  --tag=CC   --mode=compile /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I..  -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-
            2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4   -g -O2 -MT block.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/block.Tpo -c -o block.lo block.c
     337    libtool: compile:  /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I.. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwi
            wmbamtek/gsl-2.4 -g -O2 -MT block.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/block.Tpo -c block.c  -fno-common -DPIC -o .libs/block.o
     338    libtool: compile:  /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I.. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwi
            wmbamtek/gsl-2.4 -g -O2 -MT init.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/init.Tpo -c init.c  -fno-common -DPIC -o .libs/init.o
     339    libtool: compile:  /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I.. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwi
            wmbamtek/gsl-2.4 -g -O2 -MT file.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/file.Tpo -c file.c  -fno-common -DPIC -o .libs/file.o
     340    In file included from block.c:3:
  >> 341    ../gsl/gsl_block.h:4:10: fatal error: 'gsl/gsl_block_complex_long_double.h' file not found
     342    #include <gsl/gsl_block_complex_long_double.h>
     343             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     344    1 error generated.
  >> 345    make[2]: *** [block.lo] Error 1
     346    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     347    libtool: compile:  /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I.. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwi
            wmbamtek/gsl-2.4 -g -O2 -MT init.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/init.Tpo -c init.c -o init.o >/dev/null 2>&1
     348    mv -f .deps/init.Tpo .deps/init.Plo
     349    libtool: compile:  /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/block -I.. -I/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwi
            wmbamtek/gsl-2.4 -g -O2 -MT file.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/file.Tpo -c file.c -o file.o >/dev/null 2>&1
     350    mv -f .deps/file.Tpo .deps/file.Plo
  >> 351    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
  >> 352    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/gsl-2.4-2fwzuqc3qr5ifhq6isd3ovwiwmbamtek/gsl-2.4/spack-build.out
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gsl
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. macOS
 2. apple clang 9.0.0

p.s. this worked on 17 November 2017. Gsl has not been modified [for a while](https://github.com/spack/spack/commits/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/gsl/package.py). So it's either macOS updates or changes in Spack's environment/compiler wrappers, etc.

p.p.s. [homebrew](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/master/Formula/gsl.rb) has extra `--disable-dependency-tracking` configure argument, but we never had it in gsl
